plot: Anna tries to juggle her boisterous Italian family, her life outside of theatre school, her new job at a zany theatre company and her relationship with a non-ethnic commitment phobe with the help of her good friends: Margi, Sun & Jenny.
plot_en: Anna tries to juggle her boisterous Italian family, her life outside of theatre school, her new job at a zany theatre company and her relationship with a non-ethnic commitment phobe with the help of her good friends: Margi, Sun & Jenny.
plot_es: Anna tries to juggle her boisterous Italian family, her life outside of theatre school, her new job at a zany theatre company and her relationship with a non-ethnic commitment phobe with the help of her good friends: Margi, Sun & Jenny.
title: Sex & Ethnicity
